Name: Barbara
Description: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

Skills.Name: Normal Attack: Whisper of Water
Skills.Description:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 water splash attacks that deal <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal <color=#80C0FFFF>AoE Hydro DMG</color> after a short casting time.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the might of Hydro, Barbara plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#80C0FFFF>AoE Hydro DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

Descriptions: HP Regeneration Per Hit|{param3:F2P} Max HP+{param4:I}

Skills.Name: Let the Show Begin♪
Skills.Description: Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and applying the Wet status to them. Melody Loop ·On hit, Barbara's Normal Attacks heal your own party members and nearby teammates for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP. ·On hit, Barbara's Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing. ·Periodically regenerates your own active character's HP. ·Applies the Wet status to the character and to opponents who come in contact with them. Barbara's music is the magic that heals her companions.

EnergySkill.Name: Shining Miracle♪
EnergySkill.Description: Heals your own party members and nearby teammates for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP. Barbara's desire to heal strengthens her will to fight and sing.

Inherents.Name: Glorious Season
Inherents.Description: The Stamina Consumption of characters within <color=#FFD780FF>Let the Show Begin♪</color>'s Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.

Inherents.Name: Encore
Inherents.Description:
When your active character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of the Melody Loop of <color=#FFD780FF>Let the Show Begin♪</color> is extended by 1s.
The maximum extension is 5s.

Inherents.Name: With My Whole Heart♪
Inherents.Description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

Talents.Name: Vitality Burst
Talents.Description:
Decreases the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 15%.
During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG Bonus</color>.

Talents.Name: Star of Tomorrow
Talents.Description:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Shining Miracle♪</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Talents.Name: Attentiveness Be My Power
Talents.Description:
Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.
A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

Talents.Name: The Purest Companionship
Talents.Description:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

Talents.Name: Dedicating Everything to You
Talents.Description:
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
·Automatically revives the fallen character.
·Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

FetterInfo.Title: Shining Idol
FetterInfo.Detail: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

Fetters.Title: Hello
Fetters.Context: Tada! *giggles* Barbara is here~ Leave the healing to me, I will not disappoint you!

Fetters.Title: Chat: Sleepiness
Fetters.Context: *yawn* All this standing around is making me so sleepy...

Fetters.Title: Chat: Encouragement
Fetters.Context: Everyone is working super hard, we should be too!

Fetters.Title: Chat: Keeping One Refreshed
Fetters.Context: Are you tired? Try my new spicy energy drink, I'm sure it'll wake you up!

Fetters.Title: When It Rains
Fetters.Context: Don't stay out in the rain for too long, you'll catch a cold!

Fetters.Title: When Thunder Strikes
Fetters.Context: Whoa!

Fetters.Title: When It Snows
Fetters.Context: Ooh, snowflakes! Look at them dance!

Fetters.Title: When the Sun Is Out
Fetters.Context: This weather is so amazing! I could burst into song.

Fetters.Title: When the Wind Is Blowing
Fetters.Context: Don't worry! I will not... be blown away!

Fetters.Title: Good Morning
Fetters.Context: Morning~ Let's do our best today.

Fetters.Title: Good Afternoon
Fetters.Context: Oh? You want to hear me sing...? Sorry, the show is... It hasn't started yet.

Fetters.Title: Good Evening
Fetters.Context: I really want to eat some spicy squid at Good Hunter... but my stomach, er... Never mind...

Fetters.Title: Good Night
Fetters.Context: We had a great day today! Get some rest.

Fetters.Title: About Barbara
Fetters.Context: "To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward. When I'm uncertain, bless me with the wisdom to distinguish good from evil. When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back..." ...Oops, my apologies, I was just doing my prayers. *giggles* You need something?

Fetters.Title: About Us: Hopes
Fetters.Context: My dream is to bring a smile to the faces of all the people in my life! As long as I can help you on your journey, I'm happy~

Fetters.Title: About Us: Dreams
Fetters.Context: Thank you for being with me for all this time, I can feel that I'm getting closer to my dream. Hope we can keep this up in the future~!

Fetters.Title: About the Vision
Fetters.Context: Everyone has their own desires. To bring together and fulfill those desires and make everyone happy — that is the purpose my Archon has bestowed upon me.

Fetters.Title: Something to Share
Fetters.Context: I could never get bored of the breathtakingly beautiful nature that surrounds Mondstadt. I've heard that there are blue trees that exist by the sea shore near Inazuma City. I just need to save up a little more, and... What's that? You want to know what I'm saving up for? *chuckles* That's my little secret.

Fetters.Title: Interesting Things
Fetters.Context: Sunflowers always face the sun. They're so bright. In fact, my mother sent me a sunflower-style dress... I wonder when I'll finally get to wear it on stage?

Fetters.Title: About Jean
Fetters.Context: Acting Grand Master... Leader of the Knights of Favonius... Everyone seems to like her a lot. Oh? Me? I... Of course I have nothing but admiration for her!

Fetters.Title: About Lisa
Fetters.Context: I always take good care of Lisa. If she ever wants to become a star, she'll have my unconditional support, I'll cheer at the top of my lungs until my voice goes hoarse... Hmm, that might scare off her other fans though...

Fetters.Title: About Amber
Fetters.Context: I've seen Amber rushing out of Mondstadt on a mission countless times. Being an Outrider doesn't look easy.

Fetters.Title: About Diluc
Fetters.Context: Oh, Master Diluc? Last time, when I was performing at Angel's Share, he kept frowning... Maybe he doesn't like my singing?

Fetters.Title: About Venti
Fetters.Context: Venti's voice is amazing! But all the songs he sings and the ones I'm good at are very different. I tried to learn them but... the melodies are just so complicated.

Fetters.Title: About Bennett
Fetters.Context: Bennett always comes to the cathedral covered in scrapes and bruises... Though it clearly never bothers him a bit, given the big grin he always has on his face. He really should take better care of himself.

Fetters.Title: About Varka
Fetters.Context: My father left on the expedition with Grand Master Varka... I hope they are okay. Oh, what am I worried about? The Grand Master is none other than the Knight of Boreas, of course they will be fine! Still, I will be sure to pray for their safe return.

Fetters.Title: About Rosaria
Fetters.Context: Sister Rosaria is hard to get to know, especially given she never joins in on prayers, but... Oh, I'm sure she believes in the Anemo Archon! Although, I still don't really have the courage to try to talk to her...

Fetters.Title: About Noelle
Fetters.Context: Noelle is just the cutest! She's so kind and patient, you just feel totally relaxed when you're around her. ...Oh yeah, and she makes the tastiest snacks! Best part is, they're also healthy. Hehehe!

Fetters.Title: More About Barbara: I
Fetters.Context: Knights look so cool when they swing their sword in combat! Don't you think so? I tried using a sword before but... *sigh* Uh, let's just say I have zero talent with a sword.

Fetters.Title: More About Barbara: II
Fetters.Context: I want to heal everyone. This simple thought was all the motivation I needed to become a Deaconess. As long as I'm able to help everyone, I'll be content.

Fetters.Title: More About Barbara: III
Fetters.Context: Being an idol, I learned from Alice that "A true idol should always try to heal the soul of the people..." Yes, I completely agree.

Fetters.Title: More About Barbara: IV
Fetters.Context: I'm doing my best everyday... I hope my efforts earn the trust of the people of Mondstadt.

Fetters.Title: More About Barbara: V
Fetters.Context: Every time I get on stage I always start to doubt myself — can I really heal every person in Mondstadt? But I look at you now, and I feel that as long as we keep marching forward, maybe one day I might just— Huh? I've already healed you? Well, one's not enough! I've already healed a lot of people? I suppose...

Fetters.Title: Barbara's Hobbies
Fetters.Context: The smiles on the faces of the people I've helped keeps me going.

Fetters.Title: Barbara's Troubles
Fetters.Context: My companions keep getting injured, but I'm unable to share the burden of their pain. The only thing I can do is my absolute very best to heal their wounds! I'll make sure that everyone is healthy.

Fetters.Title: Favorite Food
Fetters.Context: Do you like spicy dried fish? I have two in my bag. Here, have one!

Fetters.Title: Least Favorite Food
Fetters.Context: I don't like anything bitter, especially... ugh, bitter gourd.

Fetters.Title: Receiving a Gift: I
Fetters.Context: It's a rare pleasure to eat food that suits my tastes so well. Today is a blessed day! Hehehe.

Fetters.Title: Receiving a Gift: II
Fetters.Context: Thank you for cooking these for me. This time around, you are the one healing me!

Fetters.Title: Receiving a Gift: III
Fetters.Context: Oh, uh, oh dear...

Fetters.Title: Birthday
Fetters.Context: Here you go! This is the gift I got for your birthday, along with my exclusive autograph! Hehe, when my next song comes out, I'll make sure you're the first one to hear it! Happy birthday!

Fetters.Title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
Fetters.Context: A dance from Barbara, to bring you more healing!

Fetters.Title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
Fetters.Context: Aw, thank you so much for your support! Oh no, I'm too excited, my heart just can't stop racing!

Fetters.Title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
Fetters.Context: Please, tell me how I can be stronger! Just leave it up to you? No, no, that won't do! I want to help too!

Fetters.Title: Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
Fetters.Context: Traveling with you, I have discovered that the world is my stage! Thank you so much! *giggles* Ok! Let's shout it out one more time! Three, two, one — Go Barbara, go!

Fetters.Title: Elemental Skill: I
Fetters.Context: I'll protect us!

Fetters.Title: Elemental Skill: II
Fetters.Context: Let's dance!

Fetters.Title: Elemental Skill: III
Fetters.Context: Let the show begin!

Fetters.Title: Elemental Burst: I
Fetters.Context: ♪La la-la-la-la~

Fetters.Title: Elemental Burst: II
Fetters.Context: Ready, steady, go!

Fetters.Title: Elemental Burst: III
Fetters.Context: Come on, we can do it!

Fetters.Title: Sprint Start: I
Fetters.Context: Go Barbara, go!

Fetters.Title: Sprint End: I
Fetters.Context: *pant*... I'm fine!

Fetters.Title: Sprint End: II
Fetters.Context: *pant* Keep going...

Fetters.Title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
Fetters.Context: This is the kind of surprise I could sing about.

Fetters.Title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
Fetters.Context: Oh, look at it sparkle!

Fetters.Title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
Fetters.Context: Hmm hmm hmm♪ Things are going so smoothly today~

Fetters.Title: Low HP: I
Fetters.Context: Don't worry about me!

Fetters.Title: Low HP: II
Fetters.Context: I can't stop now, they need me!

Fetters.Title: Low HP: III
Fetters.Context: Gotta keep trying!

Fetters.Title: Ally at Low HP: I
Fetters.Context: I don't want to see you hurt...

Fetters.Title: Ally at Low HP: II
Fetters.Context: Please, let me tend to your wounds!

Fetters.Title: Fallen: I
Fetters.Context: I feel... a little weak...

Fetters.Title: Fallen: II
Fetters.Context: Why has everyone stopped singing?

Fetters.Title: Fallen: III
Fetters.Context: Sister...

Fetters.Title: Light Hit Taken: I
Fetters.Context: Ouchie!

Fetters.Title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
Fetters.Context: Oh no!

Fetters.Title: Joining Party: I
Fetters.Context: I'll take care of it.

Fetters.Title: Joining Party: II
Fetters.Context: Wish me luck!

Fetters.Title: Joining Party: III
Fetters.Context: We can do this!

FetterStories.Title: Character Details
FetterStories.Context:
Barbara is the Deaconess of the Church of Favonius, as well as the shining idol of Mondstadt.
"The sight of Barbara makes all my problems disappear." This is quite a common saying among the citizens of Mondstadt.
In fact, Barbara can do much more than just put people in a better mood: Her healing powers extend to flesh wounds and other physical ailments.
Barbara is known to have access to miraculous healing powers through her Hydro Vision.
However, Barbara herself knows that hard work is the most miraculous magic of all.

FetterStories.Title: Character Story 1
FetterStories.Context:
Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara.
However, this has not always been the case. At first, Barbara's songs sounded strange to the citizens of Mondstadt, and many struggled to see the appeal.
This was because for the longest time, the folk songs of bards were the only popular songs known in Mondstadt.
Fortunately, Mondstadt stayed true to its reputation as the City of Freedom, and the people ultimately embraced the new while continuing to cherish the old.
People accepted Barbara's songs, and over time her positive energy rubbed off on them. Soon, they could be heard humming her tunes all around Mondstadt.
"Albert, would you stop please! You're completely out of tune!"

FetterStories.Title: Character Story 2
FetterStories.Context:
Barbara's feelings on her own success are mixed.
To the extent that an idol's duty is to make everyone adore her, she has done a fantastic job.
There is no doubting that she has made the right choice.
However, an idol is also expected to spread joy and relieve people's spiritual fatigue... Has she really accomplished that?
She sang for blind Glory, encouraging her to believe that her lover would one day return. She sang, too, for sick Anna, promising her that her illness would one day be cured.
Yet, the smiles on their faces never last long after the songs end.
This has led Barbara to become somewhat disillusioned and doubtful.

FetterStories.Title: Character Story 3
FetterStories.Context:
Barbara has always been a bright and optimistic girl since she was young. Though at times she can be a bit clumsy and mess things up, she always bounces right back and has another go.
Barbara is the complete opposite of her sister, who is seen by all as the pride of her family.
Unlike Barbara, her sister has always been the very definition of success in all aspects.
Initially, all Barbara had ever wanted was to surpass her sister in at least one thing, even if only once.
However, be it swordplay, her grades, or anything else, she was never able to compare.
Even for someone as optimistic as her, she found herself to be upset and down.
"Hard work is the most miraculous magic. But when even that doesn't work... what then?"

FetterStories.Title: Character Story 4
FetterStories.Context:
Barbara has never once considered giving up.
Her determination and resilience even surprised her father, Seamus Pegg, the Cardinal of Daybreak.
Barbara only allows herself to be depressed for 30 seconds.
After that, she forces herself to brighten up, no matter what.
"I'm not so good in combat, so I'll be sure to support those who are."
Under her father's counsel, Barbara became a healer.
She is as radiant as the sick and injured are pained.
Her desire to be recognized gradually transformed into a simple desire to help others.

FetterStories.Title: Character Story 5
FetterStories.Context:
"Thank you" are the two words that Barbara hears most often.
When she feels lost, she will suddenly find that there is someone wanting to hold her hand.
"Thanks for being here with me. I feel so much better."
To Barbara, the greatest reward is seeing the smiles on people's faces.
Therefore, whenever she is massaging her swollen calves or drinking tea to care for her sore throat, Barbara recalls all those who have been kind to her.
"It's the encouragement I receive from others that keeps me going."
Just maybe, the smiles she receives are proof that her songs really can heal people.
Her ambition to surpass her sister and become the most popular person in all of Mondstadt hasn't been abandoned by Barbara, it is simply buried deep inside her heart.
"If only I excelled more, perhaps I could be of help to Jean."
This is what she believes.
"Okay... Go Barbara, go!"

FetterStories.Title: Alice's Idol Magazine
FetterStories.Context:
"...Idol?"
The first time that Barbara heard this strange word, she was visibly confused.
"But... aren't The Seven the ones that people are supposed to worship?"
"Yes, but not exclusively..." replied Alice, an elder of the Hexenzirkel, as she groomed the young girl for stardom. "Read this, it contains everything you will need to know."
"Idol Magazine" was the name of the assigned reading material. Barbara had no idea what world this magazine had come from, but by reading it she found out that there was indeed such thing as an "idol," and that it mainly involved working hard at getting everyone to like you.
She also discovered that an outstanding idol is capable of not just bringing joy to themselves, but also bringing spiritual healing to others through the power of song and dance.
Barbara set about learning one new song after another, dancing to the beat as she went. Finally, she found happiness, and she found it in the smiling faces of others.
Some time later, when Alice anxiously relayed to Barbara that plans for "Teyvat Idols!" were falling through, Barbara was starting to make a name for herself through her performances in Mondstadt.
"Hmm... Well, if I'm the only one left... I guess you can leave it to me to define what it really means to be an idol!"
Driven by this ever so slightly selfish ambition to spread joy and healing to others, Barbara is slyly swotting up on new tunes behind the scenes to this very day.

FetterStories.Title: Vision
FetterStories.Context:
The story of how Barbara obtained her Vision is hardly the typical tale of high-stakes heroism.
She had just joined the church and was looking after a little boy with a high and persisting fever.
Nothing Barbara could think of would console the boy and bring an end to his relentless tears.
Someone remarked that while the boy had already taken his medicine, there was no way to cure the pain of missing one's family.
Another suggested that Barbara sing a song for the boy to raise his spirits.
Barbara had never sung a song in her life up until this point, but how could she shy away from it in a moment like this?
"Never having sung before is no reason to abandon a child in their time of need," Barbara thought to herself.
And so, Barbara took the boy in her arms and sang him a song: a lullaby, the only song she knew.
It was an unceremonious beginning to her singing career. After quickly realizing that she barely knew any of the words, she had to resort to humming the tune instead.
Nevertheless, her voice began to soothe the child, and so she kept singing. She sang the same song, over and over again, until her throat was dry and her voice was hoarse. Finally, the boy fell asleep. Exhausted, Barbara lay down by the wall and fell straight asleep herself.
Early the next morning, Barbara awoke to discover that the boy's fever had come down. Perhaps it was because she had sung for him, or perhaps it had something to do with the Vision which had mysteriously appeared next to her hand at some point during the night.
Barbara was not preoccupied with the Vision, however. It was the sight of the boy smiling once again that filled her heart with joy.
Barbara received her Vision for the simple but beautiful wish that took hold in her heart that night: A dream of healing the sick through the power of song.

Costumes.Name: Summertime Sparkle
Costumes.Description: Barbara's beach attire. This pretty skirt brims with summer vitality and carries with it a cool ocean breeze.

Costumes.Name: Innocent Longing
Costumes.Description: Barbara's outfit. A Deaconess's uniform from the Church of Favonius with a unique Barbara streak running through it.

NameCard.Name: Barbara: Flow
NameCard.Description:
Namecard style.
When Barbara sings, her melodic voice flows like the tender healing of a clear spring.
